taskDescription: Comprehensive review and expansion of guide/08-execution folder for PMP students. Review each file (index.md, executing-work.md, engagement-procurement.md, value-delivery.md, toolkit.md) to identify opportunities for more detailed explanations and examples. Make this a one-stop shop for PMP students. Evaluate if additional files are needed. Create comprehensive 25-question knowledge check covering all material. Commit and push when complete.

features.description: Review and expand index.md with comprehensive execution overview, context, and structure
Review and expand executing-work.md with detailed work execution processes and examples
Review and expand engagement-procurement.md with team engagement and procurement execution details
Review and expand value-delivery.md with comprehensive value delivery frameworks and examples
Review and expand toolkit.md with execution tools, templates, and references
Evaluate existing content and determine if additional files are needed for complete coverage
Create comprehensive 25-question knowledge-check.md covering all execution material with scenarios and detailed explanations
